review.title: “Great, stable company”
review.pros: Pros – Strong job security and good potential for advancement
review.cons: Cons – Many changes in our competitive industry, constant focused direction sometimes is lacking

review.title: “Decent company but no advancement opportunities”
review.pros: Pros – Company is well respected in the industry. Good team of people in Toronto.
review.cons: Cons – Now owned by Transforce which will mean job cuts and consolidation. No pay increases in 3 years..
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Pay people based on performance, not seniority.
